text:
e="preserve">Kings XI Punjab is one of the cricket team of Indian Premier League. The home ground of this team is PCA Stadium of Mohali, Punjab. They were captained by Kumar Sangakkara. Kings XI Punjab finished fifth in this IPL season. Kings XI Punjab did not qualify for the Champions League T20 in this year.
Season standings.
Kings XI Punjab finished 5th in the league stage of IPL 2009.
